body.name: Port Authority Reusable Face Cover (Pack of 5), White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 1 min
features: This mask is not intended for medical use, and not proven to reduce the transmission of disease.
The CDC recommends use of cotton or cloth face coverings in public to reduce community spread by asymptomatic persons
One size fits most. Best for small-to-average size faces (7” wide x 5” tall)
Reusable and machine washable: Handwash in warm and hang dry up to 15 times before discarding. Do not use bleach, chemical, or disinfectant to wash.
body.description: Two ear straps and a contoured shape make the mask versatile for many different face sizes and shapes. Fabrication: 100% Cotton, 5 single 4 oz.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: One Size Fits Most This three-ply 100% cotton face mask covers the wearer’s nose and mouth. Stretch binding and ear loops help hold it in place.

One size fits most Best for small-to-average size faces (7” wide x 5” tall). Washable Hand-wash in warm and hang dry up to 15 times before discarding. Do not use bleach, chemical, or disinfectant to wash. Pleated Three evenly placed pleats on each side. Material Three-ply, 4 oz 100% cotton jersey face mask.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are small, but good quality and breathable.
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these masks. As other reviews have mentioned, they are small and will only work on small faces. I’d say teenage girl sized face. I am a petite woman and these worked perfectly for me. They are breathable and one of the best masks I’ve worn. I tie dyed them and it was perfect. The masks do shrink slightly in the dryer and do not really stretch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought a set each for my daughter and myself. We tie dyed them. They held the color beautifully. She is 13, they fit her perfectly. Mine fit, but they are a little snug. Not too uncomfortable to avoid wearing. Just not much stretch in the ear loops if I need to pull it down out of the way for a moment. I’d still buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These run small and shrink when laundered. Quality material and construction.
reviews.reviewText: The quality seems fine, but they are small and get smaller when laundered. Due to the reusable nature of this item, the ability to be washed and dried is important. Even after the two I tested in the laundry shrank an estimated less than 10%, they no longer fit me, an adult average sized male, but fit my 13 year old daughter even better than their original size. At the original size it was a passable but tight fit for me, after unusable. I will update the review as my child continues to wear the mask and the durability of the item can be assessed, but at first inspection, I am happy with the construction. The original intention was to dye these a unique color for each of the family members, I see no reason why they won't hold dye, but that too will be mentioned in a future review edit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh... wish these were better
reviews.reviewText: They're... ok. Not great, but ok. The material is soft tshirt quality, a little bit of stretch. It's 2 layers and sewn together very well. Fits snug to the face for an adult, for a child will be too big unless you tighten the ear loops. Now, the ear loops... UGH. They are not stretchy skinny elastic loops which would be much more comfortable and not drag your ears. The loops are the same fabric as the mask and thick. They are just big enough to fit around your ears (barely and I have small ears), but they pull on your ears something awful and I cannot fathom wearing these for an 8 hour day at work. Change the ear loops and I could give these another star...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We will be purchasing again for sure!
reviews.reviewText: After reading the reviews I decided to go ahead and purchase these mask even though others said they were smaller. I knew if they were to small for me they would fit the kids. In my opinion mine is a perfect fit, but they were slightly big in the kids. (Ages in picture range from 8-14) We will be buying them again since they were super fun to make and are good quality. I will probably try the kids in the dryer to see if we can shrink them just a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Did this for my daughter (my friend) she gave me her gift card to get her her costume iguro I’m mitsuri

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WARNING: ONE SIZE FITS "MOST"
reviews.reviewText: Review Update: Unfortunately I did not date my previous review. I have downgraded to one star. I washed the mask, in COLD, and then it didn't fit any more. So I am literally going to get ONE USE out of these masks. COMPLETE waste of money! I make knit hats. I have charts. A 22 inch head is right in the middle of average, slightly large for a woman and slightly small for a man. Adding the 2 inches for the nose is also average. There is NO reason these masks should have been made as small as they are. VERY disappointed.My head is 24 inches around when I include my ears and my nose. These masks /barely/ fit me, and since they are made of cotton, I am guessing the won't fit after I wash them. The earloops are not made of elastic. The ear loops barely stretch. I had to cram my ears into them. So measure your head before you order these. I would say these are for a head/ears/nose 23 inches or less.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Breathable and pretty comfy.But not to flexible for size if you need on larger side.Did not fit my friends fiance

Amazon says nothing about copper and silver, so I was very surprised to see those on the package of this "100% cotton" mask (apparently only the cotton parts are 100% cotton). I'm not sure why, or if it's safe, to have these metals in there. I was really just looking for a cotton mask with good airflow, which this isn't really as it is quite thick - at least two layers of cotton plus mystery stuff inside. Though I have heard that silver kills viruses so maybe they are going for that effect. I have not yet decided if this surprise is a plus or a minus, but it should be properly listed on the description! It fits a bit tight, but workable.
I am weary of buying masks online because of quality but these were great. Thick and stretchy.We used them to tiedye and the colour held great! will buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: DO NOT BUY THESE FOR ADULTS - THESE ARE SO SMALL!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to have them silk screened, I was so disappointed when I received them. They would not fit anyone in my house. They are suppose to be adult size but they are definitely not! I tried to ship them back however they are not a returnable item. If you are looking for a very small adult or child mask these may do, however they are certainly not normal adult sizing!!!!! VERY DISAPPOINTING!

They are soft and comfortable however as other reviews have said very small, would be okay for a teen or a tiny Asian man. Not a good fit for me at 5' 11".They are of good quality though, if they fit better Id definitely buy again.
